data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Maluku, Indonesia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maluku, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Maluku, Indonesia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 31 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Maluku that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 49,134 believers living in Maluku, Indonesia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bati people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bati people.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Maluku
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,358,828 lost people in  Maluku, Indonesia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Maluku, Indonesia, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

location.name: Maluku
location.people_groups_list: Saleman, Hatue, Ayamaru, Lisabata-Nuniali, Teluti, Sula
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Saleman, Hatue (7,400), Ayamaru (33,000), Lisabata-Nuniali (3,200), Teluti (26,000), Sula (91,000)
